import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; import PostInputBar from './PostInputBar' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { RiWalkFill } from "react-icons/ri"; // import { RiHeart2Line } from "react-icons/ri"; import { FcLike } from "react-icons/fc"; import { FcSms } from "react-icons/fc"; import { useSelector, useDispatch, } from 'react-redux' import { fetchPosts } from '../redux/actions' import { format, formatDistanceStrict } from 'date-fns' const Feeds = () => { const allPosts = useSelector(state => state.posts.posts) console.log(allPosts) const dispatch = useDispatch() const ID = uuidv4() useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchPosts()) }, []) // const fixDate = format(new Date(), "h 'o''clock'") // console.log(fixDate) const fixDate = formatDistanceStrict( new Date(), new Date(), { roundingMethod: 'ceil' } ) return (
{allPosts?.map((post) => ( <>
{post.username}
{post.createdAt}
{post.text}
< FcLike />
Like
Comment
Follow
)) }
) } export default Feeds
